post:
**Hello LET!**

> [XYZHosting](http://xyzhosting.me) is a offshore hosting company that is focused on our customers first. We are located in Amsterdam, NL and are proud to say that we do not oversell our dedicated servers. We manage 15 NL nodes for our VPS customers including 2 shared hosting nodes. 
> 
> We use the best and newest equipment to host your website and never oversell which translates into better performance and no downtime. In fact, we guarantee 99.9% uptime on our entire network with a Service Level Agreement (SLA) in place. All plans feature our premium blend of IP Transit provided from Tiscali, GBLX, Level3, WVfiber.
> 
> 
XYZHosting is run by a team of 10 friends who started up a web hosting company together with a combined 10 years of experience, we are proud to offer fast and reliable service and treat you like a guest when your a XYZHosting customer


**LET PROMO VPS**

> _OVZ1_

> 75GB HDD 

> 2GB RAM

> 1TB Bandwidth @ 250mbit

> 4 Cores @ 3.30GHz

> $6.99/month 

> [ORDER HERE](http://www.xyzhosting.me/cart.php?a=add&pid=19)



**Current Promotions**
> Take 10% off all your invoices with Promotional Code:_ xyznew_. This promotion is applicable for the life of your service.
> Applicable to new orders only, no limit.


**Our Hardware**
> Each Node Consists of the following:
> - Intel Xeon E3-1230v2 @ 3.30GHz
> -32GB DDR3 Registered ECC RAM
> -UNSHARED 1000mbit 
> -2x1TB SATA
 

**Why choose XYZHosting?**

> Our datacenter is located in Amsterdam, NL. DMCA Ignored and premium bandwidth for all of our customers.
> Latest cPanel to easily manage your website
> 24/7 email support
> 99.9% uptime guarenteed 
> Fast and powerful servers
> Friendly support with fast response times.
